description: React component for managing store inventory, including viewing, filtering, editing prices, and adding products and categories.

methods.name: loadData
methods.description: Fetches products and categories for the current branch and updates state.

methods.name: handleEditClick
methods.description: Sets the product into edit mode for price editing.

methods.name: handleSavePrice
methods.description: Saves the updated product price to the server and updates local state.

methods.name: handleCreateCategory
methods.description: Creates a new category and updates the categories list.

methods.name: onAddSubmit
methods.description: Handles submission of new product form, adds product, and reloads data.
